attributes.action: Review the present Conservation Legislation of Whales, Grey Seals and other large sea mammals and help Save our Planet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Review the present Conservation Legislation of Whales, Grey Seals and other large sea mammals and help Save our Planet. Allow Fishermen to hunt the Whale and and other dinosaurs of the deep who steal out fish.  Eating meat causes global warming. Eating fish is healthy, improves cognitive development and provides employment for our fishermen,so let us eat it instead of the Dinosaurs of the Deep!

rejection.details: Whales, Grey Seals and other large sea mammals are not fish.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
